title: Increases number of supreme court justices in the thirteenth judicial district to ten and in the second judicial district to fifty-two
summary: Increases the number of supreme court justices in the thirteenth judicial district to ten and in the second judicial district to fifty-two.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2053

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 13, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. CUSICK, TITONE -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Judiciary

       AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to the number of justices
         of the supreme court in the second and thirteenth judicial districts

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subdivisions  2  and 13 of section 140-a of the judiciary
    2  law, subdivision 2 as amended and subdivision 13 as added by chapter 690
    3  of the laws of 2007, are amended to read as follows:
    4    2. Second district, [forty-nine] FIFTY-TWO;
    5    13. Thirteenth district, [three] TEN.
    6    S 2. Five of the additional justices of the supreme court in the thir-
    7  teenth judicial district  and  the  three  additional  justices  of  the
    8  supreme  court  in  the second judicial district provided for by section
    9  one of this act shall first be elected at the  general  election  to  be
   10  held  in November 2011 and shall first take office January 1, 2012.  The
   11  other two additional justices of the supreme  court  in  the  thirteenth
   12  judicial district provided for by section one of this act shall first be
   13  elected  at  the  general election to be held in November 2012 and shall
   14  first take office January 1, 2013.
   15    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03079-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to the number of justices of the supreme court in the second and thirteenth judicial districts
